mobiles.name: Goldmoon girl
mobiles.long_description: Goldmoon is singing a beautiful song here.
mobiles.description:
The girl's eyes are a bright sky blue; her skin is a buttery tan. Most striking
of all is the flowing white gold of her hair. Plush white furs trim her woven
cape. A single featehr folds back along the right side of her head.

mobiles.name: Fewmaster Toede
mobiles.description:
Toede's wispy, white hair tops a very ugly face. His speckled gray skin,
double chins, and pot belly all resemble those of a vicious little toad.

mobiles.name: riverwind man
mobiles.long_description: Riverwind the Ranger is standing here..
mobiles.description:
A black haired ranger whos muscles surge with power.
He looks travel weary and tired.

mobiles.name: Baaz Draconian robed
mobiles.long_description: A robed figure is standing here.
mobiles.description:
Its hard to tell anything about the figure. It is concealed by its heavy robe
and hood.

mobiles.name: Farmer
mobiles.long_description: The Farmer is standing here looking after his workers...
mobiles.description: He looks like a farmer.....go figure...

mobiles.name: Farm worker
mobiles.long_description: A farm worker is here harvesting grain.
mobiles.description: The worker is very busy...leave him alone.

mobiles.name: barracuda
mobiles.long_description: There is a barracuda swimming around you...it looks hungry..
mobiles.description: This is a very hungry looking fish with BIG teeth...

mobiles.name: Turtle Dragon
mobiles.long_description: There is a very large Turtle dragon here.
mobiles.description:
This is a very big dragon. It looks more turtle than dragon though.
Its blue-green scales glisten with moisture. Steam jets from its nostrals.
It looks intently at you as if you look you over before eating you.

mobiles.name: farmers guard dog
mobiles.long_description: The Farmer's guarddog is here guarding whatever he's suppose to guard.
mobiles.description:
This is a very mean looking dog. And since it doesn't know you ...I think he's
thinking of biting You!!....

mobiles.name: strange fish
mobiles.long_description: A fish is swimming merrily by...
mobiles.description:
Some unknown type of fish....probably originally from near Guam.
Probably walks too....

mobiles.name: hobgoblin flunky
mobiles.long_description: A small hobgoblin seems to be searching for something.
mobiles.description: The hobgolin screams at you, "Give me the blue crystal staff!!!!"

mobiles.name: White Stag
mobiles.long_description: A beautiful white stag is here.
mobiles.description:
This is the White Stag. You can't believe you actually see it....its 
suppose to be just a legend...

mobiles.name: Old pooh bear
mobiles.long_description: An old worn out winnie the pooh bear is here.
mobiles.description: This is an old pooh bear. It looks as if it has been loved a little too much.

mobiles.name: rat large
mobiles.long_description: A large rat is here eating grain.
mobiles.description:
You have the urge to kill this vile creature.
I'm sure the farmers would appreciate it too.

mobiles.name: mouse field
mobiles.long_description: A small mouse runs across your foot.
mobiles.description: The Mouse is a cute little creature.

objects.name: turtle dragon shell
objects.description: A giant Turtle dragon shell lies here.

extra_descr_data.description: This is the giant shell of a Turtle dragon.
This scythe is used by the farmers to harvest their wheat.

objects.name: blue crystal staff
objects.description: A blue crystal staff lies here.

extra_descr_data.description:
This staff is carved from a single piece of blue crystal. It is about five feet
long and has a two-inch-diameter shaft. The ornamentally bladed head of
the staff bears a gem in its center.

objects.name: bright silver bracer
objects.description: A bright silver bracer lies here.

extra_descr_data.description:
This is a bright silver bracer fitted with four gems. The inside of the
band is engraved, "Firehawk, warrior of Que-shu"

objects.name: fire pit
objects.description: There is a fire pit here, still smoldering.

extra_descr_data.description: This is the smoldering fire pit of whomever's camp this was.

objects.name: house key
objects.description: There is a house key on the ground.

extra_descr_data.description: This looks like someones house key.

objects.name: coathanger
objects.description: There is a coathanger on the ground.

extra_descr_data.description: It looks like a coathanger...duh....

objects.name: silver longsword
objects.description: There is a silver longsword on the ground.

extra_descr_data.description: This silver longsword looks as if its seen many battles.

objects.name: farmer longjohns
objects.description: A pair of farmers longjohns are lying here.

extra_descr_data.description: Its a pair of longjohns....the kind a farmer would wear.

objects.name: ancient coins gold
objects.short_description: a heap of ancient gold coins
objects.description: Some ancient gold coins lie piled up in a heap on the floor.

extra_descr_data.description: The coins seem to be gold.  From a spanish shipwreck maybe?

objects.name: ancient coins gold
objects.short_description: a heap of ancient gold coins
objects.description: Some ancient gold coins lie piled up in a heap on the floor.

extra_descr_data.description: The coins seem to be gold.  From a spanish shipwreck maybe?

objects.name: leather armor
objects.description: There is a suit of leather armor

objects.name: chamorro dagger
objects.description: There is a chamorro dagger lying here.

extra_descr_data.description: a chamorro dagger what else? It is engraved with, "Made in Guam"

objects.name: Footman's Lance
objects.description: There is a long wicked looking pole arm lying here.

extra_descr_data.description:
This is a long pole arm with detailed engravings on the shaft. The blade at the
end of the pole is formed in various hooks and spikes, to maximize the amount
of damage inflicted...

objects.name: Humanskin vest
objects.description: A large pile of skin is lying here.

extra_descr_data.description: This vest is made of multiple layers of human skin stitched together.

objects.name: draconian helmet
objects.description: A helmet made of leather and Iron lies here.

extra_descr_data.description:
This is a crudly constructed leather helmet, held together with large
iron bands.

rooms.name: Rock Outcropping
rooms.description:
>From this rock outcropping the valley below seems peaceful, untouched.
Dense forests of pine carpet the mountainsides, broken only by thick aspen 
woods. The mountains, deep blue in the distance, circle the valley floor and 
form a soft highland bowl.
There is a sign nailed to a nearby tree.

exits.description: You see the edge of the forest.

extra_descr_data.description:
**CRYSTALMIR LAKE**

For those of you who enjoy dragonlance.
First of many dragonlance areas.

Original Story and Design:

Tracy Hickman
Harold Johnson
Douglas Niles
Michael Dobson

Brought to you by  -- Strahd

rooms.name: Small Grove
rooms.description:
Suddenly, soft music begins. Its source is slim, beautiful girl. Lyre in
hand, she sits gracefully as she plays; nearby, a large plainsman raises
a flute to his lips. Her voice clear as winter wind begins to sing...

exits.description: You see a town in the distance.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Town of Solace
rooms.description:
A warm autumn breeze rustles the great vallenwood trees of Solace. The
road that wanders through the trees blazes in the bright colors of autumn.
The richly stained buildings of Solace rest cradled over head in the boughs
of the trees.

exits.description: You see the entrance to Solace
You see road through the forest.

rooms.name: East shore of Crystalmir Lake
rooms.description:
The blue of the autumn sky darkens on the deep stillness of the lake. The
soft forests of giant vallenwood border the serene waters on the eastern, 
southern and western shores. To the north a patchwork of fields stretches
toward the distant purple mountains.

exits.description: You see a path along the lake.
You see a town in the distance.
You see a path that follows the lakeshore.

rooms.name: Middle of Crystalmir Lake
rooms.description:
You are in the middle of Crystalmir lake. The water is so still it is like a
thin sheet of glass.

exits.description: You see north shore of lake.
You see east shore of lake.
You see south shore of lake.
You see west shore of lake.
You can't see much under the water.

rooms.name: North shore of Crystalmir Lake
rooms.description:
The blue of the autumn sky darkens on the deep stillness of the lake. The
soft forests of giant vallenwood border the serene waters on the eastern, 
southern and western shores. To the north a patchwork of fields stretches
toward the distant purple mountains.

exits.description: You see a path along the lake.
You see a path along the lakeshore.

rooms.name: Path along lake
rooms.description: You are walking along a path that follows the shore of the lake.

exits.description: You see the east shore of Crystalmir Lake.
You see the north shore of Crystalmir Lake.

rooms.name: West shore of Crystalmir Lake
rooms.description:
The blue of the autumn sky darkens on the deep stillness of the lake. The
soft forests of giant vallenwood border the serene waters on the eastern, 
southern and western shores. To the north a patchwork of fields stretches
toward the distant purple mountains.

exits.description: You see a path along the lakeshore.
You see a path that follows the lakeshore.
You see a rough path leading up a mountain.

rooms.name: Path along the Lake
rooms.description: You are walking on a path that follows the shore of the lake.

exits.description: You see north shore of lake.
You see west shore of lake.

rooms.name: South shore of Crystalmir Lake
rooms.description:
The blue of the autumn sky darkens on the deep stillness of the lake. The
soft forests of giant vallenwood border the serene waters on the eastern, 
southern and western shores. To the north a patchwork of fields stretches
toward the distant purple mountains.

exits.description: You see a path that follows the lakeshore.
You see a rocky path into the mountains.
You see a path that follows the lakeshore.

rooms.name: Path along the lakeshore
rooms.description: You are walking along a path that follows the shore of Crystalmir Lake.

exits.description: You see the east shore of the lake.
You see a road winding through the forest.
You see the south shore of the lake.

rooms.name: Path along the lakeshore
rooms.description: You are walking along a path that follows the shore of Crystalmir Lake.

exits.description: You see the west shore of the lake.
You see the south shore of the lake.

rooms.name: Nearfields
rooms.description:
Here, farmers and thief workers tread through fields of grain. The thick
wheat falls smoothly before the flickering scythes.

exits.description: You see a path along the lakeshore.

rooms.name: Northfields
rooms.description:
A sea of grain sweeps across the north flats. Stalks sag with ripened grain,
ready for harvest. But no one is around to harvest the grains or tend the crops.

exits.description: You see the shore of a lake.

rooms.name: Twin Flat
rooms.description:
A clear mountain valley sprawls about. To the northwest and southeast,
thick vallenwoods flash yellow and scarlet against the bright autumn sky.
To the east shimmers the cool blue of the Crystalmir Lake. Westward, the
valley enters a canyon rimmed by granite cliffs. The valley floor itself
continues to the northeast.
Some distance away, a group of huddled men pulls a large cart slowly
west down the Haven road. They sway rhythmically. Coarse, heavy robes
completely conceal their features.

exits.description: You see a path along the lakeshore.
You see a trail into the forest.

rooms.name: Jakanth Vale
rooms.description:
Trails lead deeper into the woods, but even at its edge an unnatural
stillness has settled on the place. The woods seem much the same, but
there is a subtle difference, a heaviness in the air. Even the insects are
silent.

exits.description: You see a path in the forest.

rooms.name: Trail through forest
rooms.description:
Heavily wrapped feet tread upon this trail a short time ago.
You smell smoke.

exits.description: You see an opening the the trees.
You see a trail winding through the forest.

rooms.name: Smoldering Campsite
rooms.description:
The campsite smells like burned hair. Charred bones lie in the ashes of the
fire pit. The grass has been stamped down around the area.

exits.description: You see a path winding through the forest.

rooms.name: Sentinal Gap
rooms.description:
Walls of granite soar on either side of the narrow canyon floor. A chilly
breeze whistles and rumbles between the cliffs.

exits.description: You see a path into winding into the forest.
You see a path along the lakeshore.
You see a rough path leading up a mountain.
You see a path winding into the canyon.

rooms.name: Twin Peaks Vale
rooms.description:
The twin peaks, Tasin and Fasin, stand to either side of the Shadow Canyon,
overlooking the north road to the city of Haven. In front of them, a lush
mountain valley echoes with the sweet sounds of the forest.

rooms.name: Prayers Eye Peak
rooms.description:
The flaming colors of fall surround you, and autumn breeze ripples 
through your hair. To the southwest, the white-capped outline of Prayers
Eye Peak soars in the distance. Barely visible from here, a sharp crack
splits the peak as though it consisted of two hands pressed together.

exits.description: You see the shore of a lake.
You see a rock path winding through the mountains.

rooms.name: Road through the forest
rooms.description: This is a well travelled dirt road.

exits.description: You see the entrance to a small town.
You see a path long the lakeshore.

rooms.name: Stone bridge
rooms.description:
The Solace Stream sparkles beneath an ancient stone brige. Water tumbles
out of the forest, over the rocks, and toward the Southpass that lies between
southern Sentinel Peaks. West of the bridge, the road splits in two, branching
to the south and the west. Both roads wind among the great vallenwoods,
whose boughs form a brilliant canopy over the roadway.

exits.description: You see a road winding through the forest.
You see a road winding through the forest.

rooms.name: Road among the Vallenwoods.
rooms.description:
This dusty road winds among the vallenwoods. The breeze rustles the
leaves above your head, as if to speak to you. The Road continues
west into the mountains and south to Darkenwood.

exits.description: You see a rocky path into the mountains.

rooms.name: Mountain Trail
rooms.description:
This rocky trail begins the ascent into the mountains. To the north
is Crystalmir Lake.

exits.description: You see the shore of a lake.
You see a road winding through the forest.
You see a road winding through the mountains.

rooms.name: In the Mountains
rooms.description:
You are walking on a rocky trail that winds through the mountains. From
here you can see the whole valley and Crystalmir Lake.

exits.description: You see a rocky trail descending into the forest.
You see a road winding through the mountains.

rooms.name: In the Mountains
rooms.description:
You are walking on a rocky trail that winds through the mountains. From
here you can see the whole valley and Crystalmir Lake.
From here it almost looks as if there is something at the bottom of the lake.

exits.description: You see a rocky trail winding through the mountains.
You see a rocky trail winding through the mountains.

rooms.name: In the Mountains
rooms.description:
You are walking on a rocky trail that winds through the mountains. From
here you can see the whole valley and Crystalmir Lake.

exits.description: You see a rocky trail winding through the mountains.
You see a rocky trail winding through the mountains.

rooms.name: Among the Vallenwoods
rooms.description:
You are walking among the peaceful vallenwoods. They sway in the
breeze in a dance of autumn.

exits.description: You see a road winding through the forest.

rooms.name: Solace East Woods
rooms.description:
The huge vallenwood trees tower above soft forest paths. Sunlight dapples
the floor of the woods, and sparrows and squirrels quarrel overhead. The
musty smell of fallen leaves rises through the fragrance of late wildflowers.

rooms.name: Northfields
rooms.description:
A sea of grain sweeps across the north flats. Stalks sag with ripened grain,
ready for harvest. But no one is around to harvest the grains or tend the crops.

rooms.name: Northfields
rooms.description:
A sea of grain sweeps across the north flats. Stalks sag with ripened grain,
ready for harvest. But no one is around to harvest the grains or tend the crops.

rooms.name: Northfields
rooms.description:
A sea of grain sweeps across the north flats. Stalks sag with ripened grain,
ready for harvest. But no one is around to harvest the grains or tend the crops.

rooms.name: Northfields
rooms.description:
A sea of grain sweeps across the north flats. Stalks sag with ripened grain,
ready for harvest. But no one is around to harvest the grains or tend the crops.

rooms.name: Northfields
rooms.description:
A sea of grain sweeps across the north flats. Stalks sag with ripened grain,
ready for harvest. But no one is around to harvest the grains or tend the crops.

rooms.name: Northfields
rooms.description:
A sea of grain sweeps across the north flats. Stalks sag with ripened grain,
ready for harvest. But no one is around to harvest the grains or tend the crops.

rooms.name: Northfields
rooms.description:
A sea of grain sweeps across the north flats. Stalks sag with ripened grain,
ready for harvest. But no one is around to harvest the grains or tend the crops.

rooms.name: Northfields
rooms.description:
A sea of grain sweeps across the north flats. Stalks sag with ripened grain,
ready for harvest. But no one is around to harvest the grains or tend the crops.

rooms.name: A Farmer's House
rooms.description: A typical farmers house is here next to the endless fields of grain.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description:
This is the living room of the farmer. you don't live here.
And you don't know the farmer. Why are you here?

rooms.name: Top of Stairs
rooms.description:
You are standing at the top of the stairs.
There is a picture of Grandma on the wall.

extra_descr_data.description:
It is a picture of Grandma....

or is it Grandpa...?

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description:
You are standing in the bedroom of the farmer.
There are family pictures hanging on the walls.
An antique bed sits in one corner of the room.

exits.description: You see the top of the stairs.

extra_descr_data.description:
Thats strange...
They all sorta look like pictures of like...

Like....

Farmers....

well what did you expect?

rooms.name: Kids Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the kids bedroom.
There are posters plastered to every inch of wallspace.
An bunk bed sits against the wall.
You see a closet to the south.

exits.description: You see the top of the stairs.

extra_descr_data.description:
I LOVE you 'cause you
are SUPERDYDUPERDY!!!

Barney

They seem to be various posters
of a purple dinosaur singing...

There is a autograph on one poster.

rooms.name: In the closet
rooms.description:
You are standing in the bedroom closet.
There are cedar blocks and
mothballs in here.
Uh oh....The door closed behind you.
You are locked in.

extra_descr_data.description:
They look like white Malt balls...
I wonder if they taste like it too?

Looks like cedar blocks.
what did you expect ? Gold?
This is a FARMER's house.

rooms.name: Underwater
rooms.description:
It is very dim here. You can make out the faint surfaces of the lake floor
and other rocks. You hope you can hold your breath long enough.
It looks as if the surface of the lake is make of glass...

exits.description: You see the surface of Crystalmir Lake.

rooms.name: Underwater
rooms.description:
It is very dim here. You can make out the faint surfaces of the lake floor
and other rocks. You hope you can hold your breath long enough.
It looks as if the surface of the lake is make of glass...
In fact you can't break the surface!...You need air SOON!

rooms.name: Underwater
rooms.description:
It is very dim here. You can make out the faint surfaces of the lake floor
and other rocks. You hope you can hold your breath long enough.
It looks as if the surface of the lake is make of glass...
In fact you can't break the surface!...You need air SOON!

and other rocks. You hope you can hold your breath long enough.
It looks as if the surface of the lake is make of glass...
In fact you can't break the surface!...You need air SOON!

rooms.name: Underwater Cave
rooms.description:
This is an underwater cave that seems to have trapped some air in it.
It seems as if the cave continued deeper, but it is blocked by a rock
slide.

extra_descr_data.description: There is no way you are going to clear away all the rocks.

rooms.name: Underwater Passageway
rooms.description:
This passageway is almost completely filled with water. It seems to have
trapped some air. Some thing doesn't feel right. Maybe you should leave.

rooms.name: Underwater Passageway
rooms.description:
This passageway is almost completely filled with air. This is REALLY strange.
You wonder how this can be. Something is definetly wrong.
The air here is very humid and it seem to be getting warmer to the south.

rooms.name: Cave of the Turtle Dragon
rooms.description:
This Cave is enormous. It is mostly flooded with water. The air is very
humid and misty. Large piles of bones lay all over. The walls are covered
with scratches and claw marks.

extra_descr_data.description:
Mostly the are fish bones...
But some of them look like humanoid bones...

rooms.name: Narrow Crack in the rock.
rooms.description:
This seems to a crack caused by some earthquake or other natural event.
The opening is large here, but seems to get smaller as it goes on.

rooms.name: Small Tunnel
rooms.description:
This is a small tunnel that seems to go deeper into the mountains.
It is completely filled with water.
Some light filters in through the muck to the east.

rooms.name: Dead end
rooms.description:
The tunnel seems to dead end here.
There is nothing but mud and a small pocket of air.

rooms.name: Nest Entrance
rooms.description:
This seems to be the entrance to a nest of some kind.
The water here is very murky.

rooms.name: Barracuda Nest
rooms.description:
You have disturbed a barracuda nest. They are none too pleased and
now plan to use you for their next feeding....

rooms.name: Kids Closet.
rooms.description:
You are standing in the kids closet. There are piles of unwashed laundry
and toys. You see an evil looking book  lying against the south wall.
